name: Facebook - sticky left bar with collapsed subitems
description: This style holds the left column on a fixed position when you scroll the page. The collapsed subitems will fly in when you hover over them. Compatible with my Dark, Black and Pink Facebook themes.
additional_info: Internet Explorer doesn't support the transition property yet. The subitems will show up, but they won't fly in smoothly, as they do in other major browsers. ChangeLog May 26, 2014 update for the missing "Favorites" headline
